question: Which therapies target TOP1 and also have biomarker evidence in Lung Non-small Cell Carcinoma?
cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('TOP1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('TOP1'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Lung Non-small Cell Carcinoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

WHERE toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Breast')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: What drugs targeting ALK have biomarker evidence in Lung Non-small Cell Carcinoma?
cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('ALK')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('ALK'))

  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('ALK')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('ALK'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Lung Large Cell Carcinoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('ALK'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Melanoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('ALK')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('ALK'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Lung Non-small Cell Carcinoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('ALK'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Mucosal Melanoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Anaplastic Astrocytoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('ALK'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Congenital Fibrosarcoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

WHERE toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Pancreatic Carcinoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Which therapies target AKT1 and also have biomarker evidence in Breast Cancer?
cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('AKT1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('AKT1'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Breast')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN

  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Show treatments hitting AKT2 that have biomarker evidence in Prostate Cancer.
cypher:

RETURN

  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('AKT2'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Prostate')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('AKT3')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('AKT3'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Stomach')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

WHERE toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Melanoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('FGFR1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('FGFR1'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Breast')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: List therapies that target FGFR1 with evidence in Intrahepatic Cholangiocarcinoma.
cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('FGFR1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('FGFR1'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Intrahepatic Cholangiocarcinoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('FGFR1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('FGFR1'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Lung')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100
